languages.text: "Страх — враг долга. Святая Инквизиция не вербует бесстрашных. Но тем, кто не в состоянии побороть свою слабость, она быстро находит замену. Посмертно".
"Fear is the enemy of duty. Anyone who cannot overcome this weakness does not last long in the Holy Inquisition."
languages.original_text: "Страх — враг долга. Святая Инквизиция не вербует бесстрашных. Но тем, кто не в состоянии побороть свою слабость, она быстро находит замену. Посмертно".

traits.locale_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. The Holy Inquisition does not recruit those without fear. But anyone who cannot overcome their weakness is quickly replaced. Posthumously."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. The Holy Inquisition does not recruit those without fear. But anyone who cannot overcome their weakness is quickly replaced. Posthumously."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. The Holy Inquisition does not recruit those without fear. But anyone who cannot overcome their weakness is quickly replaced. Posthumously."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. The Holy Inquisition does not recruit those without fear. But anyone who cannot overcome their weakness is quickly replaced. Posthumously."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “恐惧是责任的大敌。凡是无法克服这个弱点的人，都没办法在审判庭呆得太久。”
languages.original_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. Anyone who cannot overcome this weakness does not last long in the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: “恐惧是责任的大敌。凡是无法克服这个弱点的人，都没办法在审判庭呆得太久。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « La peur est l'ennemie du devoir. Ceux qui ne parviennent pas à surmonter cette faiblesse ne font pas long feu dans la Sainte Inquisition. »
languages.original_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. Anyone who cannot overcome this weakness does not last long in the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: « La peur est l'ennemie du devoir. Ceux qui ne parviennent pas à surmonter cette faiblesse ne font pas long feu dans la Sainte Inquisition. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Angst ist die Feindin der Pflicht. Wer diese Schwäche nicht überwinden kann, hat in der Heiligen Inquisition keine Zukunft."
languages.original_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. Anyone who cannot overcome this weakness does not last long in the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "Angst ist der Feind von Pflicht. Die Heilige Inquisition rekrutiert niemanden ohne Furcht. Doch jeder, der seine Schwäche nicht überwinden kann, wird schnell ersetzt. Posthum."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「恐怖は聖務成就の誓いの敵だ。この弱点を克服できぬ者は、神聖なる異端審問庁で長く働くことはできない」
languages.original_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. Anyone who cannot overcome this weakness does not last long in the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: 「恐怖は聖務成就の誓いの敵だ。この弱点を克服できぬ者は、神聖なる異端審問庁で長く働くことはできない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «El miedo es el enemigo del deber. Si alguien no puede superar esta debilidad, dura poco en la Inquisición».
languages.original_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. Anyone who cannot overcome this weakness does not last long in the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: «El miedo es el enemigo del deber. Si alguien no puede superar esta debilidad, dura poco en la Inquisición».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. Anyone who cannot overcome this weakness does not last long in the Holy Inquisition."

languages.text: "Korku, vazifenin düşmanıdır. Zayıflıklarının üstesinden gelemeyenler, Kutsal Engizisyon'da çok barınamazlar."
languages.original_text: "Fear is the enemy of duty. Anyone who cannot overcome this weakness does not last long in the Holy Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "Korku, vazifenin düşmanıdır. Zayıflıklarının üstesinden gelemeyenler, Kutsal Engizisyon'da çok barınamazlar."
